Posts.Content: sunshinegirl wrote: I had a bout with celluitis on my arm about 2 years ago,a year after my breast cancer surgery. I had my cellutis again last week. This timeÂ  the rash was on my breast, part of my back and upper arm. I went to my doctor who put me on kelfex for 10 days, but said if it gets worse to go to emerg. But in 2 days it did a get a lot better, but my breast and arm the skin is dry and peeling.The skin color is pink and blochy. Does anybody know how long does it take to clear up? Posts.Title: celluitis again sunshinegirl kira

Posts.Content: sunshinegirl wrote: I had my radiation done by June 14/07, I went to my surgeon for reg follow up, he checked where my incision was and said there was a lump by it. I said could it be scare tissue. He said it might but it was a concern to him. He wants me to have mammogram in December and see him a week later. Did anybody have a recurrence this soon? I had my surgery in February for a lumpectomy with no positive lymph nodes. My onc just saw me 3 weeks ago and said everything looks ok and I had the lump there already. Log in to post a reply
Posts.Title: recurrence 3months after radiation sunshinegirl badboob67
